name: Google Inbox Monospace
description: Allows monospace font to be used in compose and viewing of plain text emails in Google Inbox.
additional_info:
- Adapted from Gmail Monospace (https://userstyles.org/styles/103015/gmail-monospace-monospace)
- For use with Stylish (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe?hl=en)
